title: The sale start time for the Upcoming sales
body:
>Please note that all sales start at 19:01 AEDT on the listed day.

Why in the hell are we starting sales at 7pm?

Like i feel the "listed date" is really not usable because the majority of the time they are on sale, is the next damn day.

Oh this skin is on sale this day for 5 hours, and the next day for 19 hours, but this is the day it goes on sale.

I know NA forces these times, but god damn for once, can we use our own timezone?

Have a little bit of sanity for us in Oceania, we don't ask for much (well actually we ask for a lot of shit, but that ain't the point) but i honestly think it's not much to have the sale times correspond with our time zones here in OCE.
